page.title: 16Games Children Play
page.content: {BULLDOG} is a very exciting game. One person is "on" and they shout a name and you have to run over a line. If you don't get caught everyone else has to try. If you do get caught you are "on" and have to say "Bulldog, bulldog,1,2,3, caught,caught,caught." {MARBLES}is a simple game. It is played with stones or small glass 'balls' called 'marbles'. All you have to do is to try and hit your opponents marble to win. You can also play by trying to get your marbles into a hole. You have to be good at aiming. {FAVOURITE INDOOR GAMES} I SPY. O GRADY, MONOPOLY, DRAUGHS, CHESS, PAC MAN, CARDS, HANGMAN, {FAVOURITE OUTDOOR GAMES} RACING, TIG, SKIPPING, HIDE'n'SEEK, ROUNDERS, HOPSCOTCH, FARMERS in his DEN, FRENCH SKIPPING, FINGERS.
